name: MASTERCARD WORLDWIDE
sampleDescriptions: Monitor issues related to tax reform.

Monitor issues related to PL 111-203 Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act, regarding implementation of the provisions in Title X-Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection.
Monitor issues related to Russian sanctions legislation.
Issues relating to interchange and card acceptance costs.
Monitor issues relating to mobile payments.
Monitor issues related to pre-paid electronic cards.
Monitor issues related to the Federal Reserve's activities and reports involving oversight of the electronic payment systems.
Monitor issues related to Cyber Security.
